item.title: [Refactored]8 lined chatbox
item.dc:creator: @Stewie2 Stewie_
item.description:
@Stewie2 wrote:

Okay since some people are either too lazy to do figure it out themselves or just don’t want to take the time to refactor the tutorial, I decided to Refactored the Chatbox and perfect it for them. But I mainly did it Because my Mate Stephen had Requested it. And I promised I would do it.
So here we go.

Purpose: To Perfect Your Chatbox
Classes Modified:Client.java and/or Sprite.java
Difficulty: 2-3/10(must pay attention to stuff)
Tested on:Refactored 317 Deob, Galkons Refactored Base
Enjoi!

WARNING: You will need to resize some of your sprites after you do this tutorial!

We got that out the way so here we go:

To start off with you will need to do Galkons custom crown tutorial. If you haven’t here it is:
Correctly Adding Custom Crowns

Next Open up the Client Class.
Find your method named drawChatArea and replace yours with mine:

[code] private void drawChatArea() {
aRSImageProducer_1166.initDrawingArea();
Texture.anIntArray1472 = anIntArray1180;
chatBack.drawSprite(0, 0);
if (messagePromptRaised) {
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(0, aString1121, 56, 260);
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(128, promptInput + “", 75, 260);
} else if (inputDialogState == 1) {
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(0, “Enter amount:”, 56, 260);
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(128, amountOrNameInput + "”, 75, 260);
} else if (inputDialogState == 2) {
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(0, “Enter name:”, 56, 260);
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(128, amountOrNameInput + “*”, 75, 260);
} else if (aString844 != null) {
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(0, aString844, 56, 260);
chatTextDrawingArea.drawText(128, “Click to continue”, 75, 260);
} else if (backDialogID != -1) {
drawInterface(0, 0, RSInterface.interfaceCache[backDialogID], 0);
} else if (dialogID != -1) {
drawInterface(0, 0, RSInterface.interfaceCache[dialogID], 0);
} else {
TextDrawingArea textDrawingArea = aTextDrawingArea_1271;
int j = 0;

        DrawingArea.setDrawingArea(113, 0, 486, 0);
        for (int k = 0; k < 100; k++) {
            if (chatMessages[k] != null) {
                int l = chatTypes[k];
                int i1 = (109 - j * 14) + anInt1089;
                String s1 = chatNames[k];
                byte byte0 = 0;

                if (s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr1@")) {
                    s1 = s1.substring(5);
                    byte0 = 1;
                }
                if (s1 != null && s1.startsWith("@cr2@")) {
                    s1 = s1.substring(5);
                    byte0 = 2;
                }
                if (l == 0) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0, chatMessages[k], i1, 4);
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if ((l == 1 || l == 2)
                        && (l == 1 || publicChatMode == 0
                        || publicChatMode == 1 && isFriendOrSelf(s1))) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        int j1 = 4;

                        if (byte0 == 1) {
                            modIcons[0].method361(j1, i1 - 12);
                            j1 += 14;
                        }
                        if (byte0 == 2) {
                            modIcons[1].method361(j1, i1 - 12);
                            j1 += 14;
                        }
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0, s1 + ":", i1, j1);
                        j1 += textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s1) + 8;
                        textDrawingArea.method385(255, chatMessages[k], i1,
                                j1);
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if ((l == 3 || l == 7) && splitPrivateChat == 0
                        && (l == 7 || privateChatMode == 0
                        || privateChatMode == 1 && isFriendOrSelf(s1))) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        int k1 = 4;

                        textDrawingArea.method385(0, "From", i1, k1);
                        k1 += textDrawingArea.getTextWidth("From ");
                        if (byte0 == 1) {
                            modIcons[0].method361(k1, i1 - 12);
                            k1 += 14;
                        }
                        if (byte0 == 2) {
                            modIcons[1].method361(k1, i1 - 12);
                            k1 += 14;
                        }
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0, s1 + ":", i1, k1);
                        k1 += textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s1) + 8;
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0x800000, chatMessages[k],
                                i1, k1);
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if (l == 4
                        && (tradeMode == 0
                                || tradeMode == 1 && isFriendOrSelf(s1))) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0x800080,
                                s1 + " " + chatMessages[k], i1, 4);
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if (l == 5 && splitPrivateChat == 0 && privateChatMode < 2) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0x800000, chatMessages[k],
                                i1, 4);
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if (l == 6 && splitPrivateChat == 0 && privateChatMode < 2) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0, "To " + s1 + ":", i1, 4);
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0x800000, chatMessages[k],
                                i1,
                                12
                                + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth("To " + s1));
                    }
                    j++;
                }
                if (l == 8
                        && (tradeMode == 0
                                || tradeMode == 1 && isFriendOrSelf(s1))) {
                    if (i1 > 0 && i1 < 120) {
                        textDrawingArea.method385(0x7e3200,
                                s1 + " " + chatMessages[k], i1, 4);
                    }
                    j++;
                }
            }
        }

        DrawingArea.defaultDrawingAreaSize();
        anInt1211 = j * 14 + 7;
        if (anInt1211 < 113) {
            anInt1211 = 113;
        }
        method30(112, anInt1211 - anInt1089 - 112, 0, 488, anInt1211);
        String s;

        if (myPlayer != null && myPlayer.name != null) {
            s = myPlayer.name;
        } else {
            s = TextClass.fixName(myUsername);
        }
        textDrawingArea.method385(0, s + ":", 124, 4);
        textDrawingArea.method385(255, inputString + "*", 112,
                6 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s + ": "));
        DrawingArea.method339(112, 0, 505, 0);
    }
    if (menuOpen && menuScreenArea == 2) {
        drawMenu();
    }
    aRSImageProducer_1166.drawGraphics(344, super.graphics, 8);
    aRSImageProducer_1165.initDrawingArea();
    Texture.anIntArray1472 = anIntArray1182;
}

[/code]Now find something similar to this in drawGameScreen:

if (backDialogID == -1) { aClass9_1059.scrollPosition = anInt1211Replace it with this: [code]if (backDialogID == -1) {
aClass9_1059.scrollPosition = anInt1211 - anInt1089 - 112;
if (super.mouseX > 482 && super.mouseX < 560 && super.mouseY > 345) {
method65(482, 112, super.mouseX - 15, super.mouseY - 345,
aClass9_1059, 0, false, anInt1211);
}
int i = anInt1211 - 112 - aClass9_1059.scrollPosition;

        if (i < 0) {
            i = 0;
        }
        if (i > anInt1211 - 112) {
            i = anInt1211 - 112;
        }
        if (anInt1089 != i) {
            anInt1089 = i;
            inputTaken = true;
        }
    }[/code]Now get ready.
  1. Find this:

aRSImageProducer_1123 = new RSImageProducer(496, 50, getGameComponent());Replace with this:

aRSImageProducer_1123 = new RSImageProducer(496, 31, getGameComponent());2.Find this:

aRSImageProducer_1123.drawGraphics(453, super.graphics, 0);Replace with this:

aRSImageProducer_1123.drawGraphics(472, super.graphics, 0);3.Find this:

aRSImageProducer_1166 = new RSImageProducer(479, 96, getGameComponent());Replace with this:

aRSImageProducer_1166 = new RSImageProducer(506, 128, getGameComponent());4.Find this:

backVmidIP3.drawGraphics(357, super.graphics, 496);Replace with this:

backVmidIP3.drawGraphics(344, super.graphics, 514);5.Find this:

backVmidIP2.drawGraphicsReplace with this:

backVmidIP2.drawGraphics(205, super.graphics, 516);6.Find this:

backLeftIP2.drawGraphics(357, super.graphics, 0);Replace with this:

backLeftIP2.drawGraphics(338, super.graphics, 0);7.Find this:

backLeftIP1.drawGraphicsReplace with this:

backLeftIP1.drawGraphics(4, super.graphics, 0);8.Find this:

Texture.method365(512, 334);Replace with this:

Texture.method365(506, 128);9. If your frame is messed up, don’t be surprised as you have to resize sprites, and all that. Just go to the original post and get those sprites if you need to.
Okay This chatbox looks better with the new-ish scroller and alot of other edits

Okay thats it. Thanks for taking your time.
Now for credits.

80% JGMS(Did original Chatbox, Scroll bar, and His Client is Good
10% Galkon(Refactored Scroller,Right Click Menus, and Gave me Idea to Refactor this)
5% Me(Refactoring and posting)
5% Badreligion(New Chatbox Buttons, and got some links off his thread)

If you get errors Post them!

Read full topic
